briefTitle: Faslodex Registry: Fulvestrant in Current Clinical Practice
officialTitle: Faslodex Registry: a Belgian Observational Study to Evaluate the Use of Fulvestrant in Current Clinical Practice
primaryOutcomeMeasure: to collect real life data on the use of fulvestrant in clinical practice in Belgium. Previous therapies (hormonal and chemo) for breast cancer and for advanced breast cancer will be documented for each patient.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Postmenopausal women with hormone receptor-positive locally advanced or metastatic breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:
